npc.name: Roy
npc.dialog: Welcome to our world! You are currently in danger. Take this weapon, you will need this. Cut through the forest to a small village. You will find help there.

npc.name: Engy
npc.dialog: Get lost. I hate you. Leave from this place if you want your safety. Else you will be killed by me. You are annoying. Don't disturb me
